body_html:
I'm happy to hear you got the build to work.

Referencing the instructions you were using: https://developer.ibm.com/tutorials/install-tensorflow-on-power/

bazel build //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package ../tensorflow_pkg

That last command will create the whl file in ../tensorflow_pkg

The whl file will only work with the CUDA version you compiled against. (And the cuDNN major version and nccl major version)

The whl file will only work with the CUDA version you compiled against. (And the cuDNN major version and nccl major version)
body:
I'm happy to hear you got the build to work.

Referencing the instructions you were using: https://developer.ibm.com/tutorials/install-tensorflow-on-power/

bazel build //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package
bazel-bin/tensorflow/tools/pip_package/build_pip_package ../tensorflow_pkg

That last command will create the whl file in ../tensorflow_pkg

The whl file will only work with the CUDA version you compiled against. (And the cuDNN major version and nccl major version)
